law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, this title applies to the working conditions a...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, this title applies to the working conditions at each work place in the State.

This title does not apply to a working condition of:
an employee of the federal government or its units; or
an employee whose occupational safety and health is protected under:
the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977;
the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Act; or
the Atomic Energy Act of 1954.
